text:
"Diary of a Wimpy Kid" is an ongoing series of currently fifteen books written by Jeff Kinney. The series is about a middle school student named Greg Heffley. The books are written in the style of Greg's diary. They contain many drawings, all with no color.
Books.
In 2019, a book called ' was released. It is written by Greg's best friend, Rowley. In 2020, another Rowley book called "Rowley Jefferson's Awesome Friendly Adventure" was announced.
Movies.
The series has four movies, each based on the book of the same name.
